page.title: 07COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content:
RELIGION There are 5 churches in Horncastle. They are :_ The Parish Church of St Mary, the Evangelical, Pentecostal, United Reform and Methodist churches and the Jehovah's Witnesses.
EDUCATION There are 7 schools in Horncastle, covering all ages and abilities. The Residential College has 3500 pupils each term and is open 7 days a week. There are 68 bedrooms and 86 beds for the students' accommodation. Courses vary from bridge to weaving and from French to genealogy.
THE COMMUNITY CENTRE Different groups meet here including Brownies, cubs and church youth groups.Old people also come here mainly to play cards, bowls and talk.
